html:
PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-11122024-10-16PS
ActFirearms Act
SubjectShipment by Post of Certain Prohibited Firearms and Prohibited Devices by Certain Businesses Regulations
PrecisSHIPMENT BY POST OF CERTAIN PROHIBITED FIREARMS AND PROHIBITED DEVICES BY CERTAIN BUSINESSES REGULATIONS in order to (1) permit businesses to ship by post the prohibited items, under certain conditions, for the purposes of destruction; (2) exempt Canada Post to meet storage and transportation measures under the Storage, Display and Transportation of Firearms and Other Weapons by Business Regulations in the course of transmission by post; and (3) not authorize prohibited assault-style rifles that are also a controlled good listed in the Schedule of the Defence Productions Act to be shipped by Canada Post.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2024-0208 Publication Date: 2024-11-06
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: SHIPMENT BY POST OF CERTAIN PROHIBITED FIREARMS AND PROHIBITED DEVICES BY CERTAIN BUSINESSES REGULATIONS in order to (1) permit businesses to ship by post the prohibited items, under certain conditions, for the purposes of destruction; (2) exempt Canada Post to meet storage and transportation measures under the Storage, Display and Transportation of Firearms and Other Weapons by Business Regulations in the course of transmission by post; and (3) not authorize prohibited assault-style rifles that are also a controlled good listed in the Schedule of the Defence Productions Act to be shipped by Canada Post.
